mapper.select: SELECT tbl.m_num, tbl.m_name, tbl.m_content, tbl.m_people_cnt, tbl.m_area, tbl.m_profile, tbl.i_cate_num, tbl.u_id FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(board_tbl pk_board)*/ ROWNUM rn, meet.* FROM (SELECT * FROM meet ORDER BY m_num DESC)meet WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount})tbl WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1 * #{amount})
